metadata.documentation: Coordinated Regional Climate Downscaling Experiment(CORDEX)
Earth System Grid Federation (ESGF)

The Coordinated Regional Climate Downscaling Experiment CORDEX (http://wcrp-cordex.ipsl.jussieu.fr/) is an international coordinated effort under the auspices of the World Climate Research Programme's Working Group on Regional Climate to provide homogeneously designed regional climate model output to users.

Data downloaded from ESGF at original resolution (http://pcmdi-cmip.llnl.gov/cmip5/index.html) on 15/08/2015 and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).
Dataset included in the User Data Gateway (UDG, http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki) maintained by the Santander MetGroup. Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset.
